== Nandakumar Edamana ==
Free software user, developer and educator from Kerala, India. Started using Ubuntu in 2010.
=== Contributions ===
Served as a speaker and trainer in local Ubuntu-related workshops, wrote a book in Malayalam on Ubuntu. Developed a couple of applications including Parayumpole Malayalam typing tool and Sammaty school election software that will work on Ubuntu.
